hadiths.text: Aishah said:One of us would have a shirt in which she would menstruate and in it she became sexually defiled. Then if she ever saw any drop of blood in it, she would rub it off by applying her saliva

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَغْسِلُ ثَوْبَهَا الَّذِي تَلْبَسُهُ فِي حَيْضِهَا
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Washes Her Garment That She Wears During Her Menses [To Pray In]
